name: Small and Medium Entrepreneurs of Europe
goal: The purpose of “SME Europe” (Small and Medium Entrepreneurs of Europe) is to shape EU policies in a more SME friendly way. SMEs are the backbone of the European economy as it is especially them that create sustainable jobs, growth and prosperity.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
SME Policy
Start-Ups Policy
Entrepreneurship
Regulation
Digital Agenda
Female Entrepreneurship
Energy
Family Business
Administrative Burdens
Regional Development
Finance Policy
Standardizations
